home.heroDesc: Icebreakers ¬∑ AI Sommelier ¬∑ Mood Playlists. Your pocket party arsenal.
home.featuredGamesSubtitle: Secret weapons for a perfect night
home.hostPersonaDesc: Cheersin makes you look like a legend.

trivia.t1: Fact: Champagne bubbles make alcohol hit your bloodstream faster!
trivia.t2: Pro Tip: Have a pitcher of water ready before starting drinking games.
trivia.t3: Did you know? The longest party on record lasted 58 hours.
trivia.t4: Hangover Hack: Drink a glass of water before bed.
trivia.t5: Expert says: Music is the soul of a party. Pick a good playlist!
trivia.t6: Don't drink and drive. Stay safe with Cheersin.

ageGate.title: Age verification
ageGate.desc: This site contains alcohol-related content. You must be 18 or older to continue.
ageGate.under18Desc: This site contains alcohol-related content. Please leave this page.
ageGate.disclaimer: Drink responsibly. Must be 18+ to enter.

pricing.title: Choose a plan
pricing.heading: Choose your
pricing.subheading: Free forever plus personal / VIP upgrades. Unlock full features as you need.
pricing.faq0a: Yes. Cancel in Subscription management anytime; no further charges after the current period. See Terms.
pricing.faq1a: We accept card and PayPal, securely.
pricing.faq2a: Cancel before trial ends to avoid charge; otherwise we charge at trial end. Promos (e.g. half off first month) are shown in the subscription flow.
pricing.faq3a: Full refund in the first month, no reason needed. Within 7 days with no material use of paid features, full refund. See Terms.
pricing.faq4a: Plans are for personal and small events; streaming and personal channels welcome. For commercial or enterprise, contact us (Team plan or enterprise@cheersin.app).
pricing.faq5a: When available, promo codes and rules are shown on checkout or pricing. Enter at checkout to apply.
pricing.faq6q: Can I get a refund if I'm not satisfied?
pricing.faq6a: Absolutely. We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee. If you feel Pro didn't help your party, contact support for a full refund.

whyPay.title: Why Go Pro?
whyPay.subtitle: Don't let a boring party ruin your reputation.

partyHost.title: To the Party Host
partyHost.subtitle: Stop taking the blame for boring parties.

card1.title: Searching games forever?
card1.desc: Stop browsing 100 sites. Cheersin has 50+ hit party games, ready in one click.

card2.title: Guests on their phones?
card2.desc: Awkward silence? Ice-breakers in 30 seconds to get everyone off their screens.

card3.title: Don't know what to buy?
card3.desc: On a budget? AI Sommelier picks the perfect bottle for your taste and occasion.

cookie.title: Cookie consent
cookie.description: We use cookies for service, sign-in and basic operation. Optional analytics cookies help us improve. You can decline non-essential cookies and still browse normally.

games.noMatch: No games match. Try another category or keyword.
games.scrollToCreate: Or scroll down to create a room and invite friends.
games.russianRouletteRules:
Classic Russian Roulette!
Take turns. Whoever gets the bullet drinks!
6 slots, 1 bullet.
games.reactionMasterRules:
Click the matching color as fast as you can!
First correct click wins!
Wrong or too early = you lose.
games.bottleCapRules:
Aim and shoot the bottle cap!
Bullseye 3 pts, yellow 2, green 1!
Miss = drink!

status.title: Service status (live)
status.errorHint: Could not get service status. Check .env.local and restart dev server.
status.pageDescription: If the homepage shows a maintenance notice, we are under maintenance and some features may be temporarily unavailable. Below is the live service status: Not configured means the service variable is not set in .env.local; Error means connection or key issue‚Äîfix as suggested.

werewolf.title: Werewolf Lite
werewolf.rules:
4-8 players. Roles: Wolves ({{wolfCount}}), Seer (1, when 6+ players), rest Villagers.
Night: Wolves eliminate one.
Day: Discuss and vote; highest votes is out.
Villagers win when all wolves are out; Wolves win when villagers ‚â§ wolves.
werewolf.nightPrompt: Night {{round}} ‚Äî Wolves, open your eyes and choose who to eliminate
werewolf.dayDiscuss: Discuss and vote during the day
